entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #58371
  • [Blazor][Antiforgery] Error 400 for a static SSR page, related to the constant antiforgery token update, if the redirect was from another domain. #58370
  • UseHealthChecks does not allow trailing slash as documented #58369
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #58367
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58360
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #58359
  • Determine if request is for static asset #58358
  • esproj does not have a target for pack and breaks dotnet pack #58356

Closed

  • InputDate Docs has a broken list #57357
    Backlog
  • OpenIdConnectHandler.ValidateTokenUsingHandlerAsync() does not copy a value from the _configuration.Issuer #58327
  • Adding IdentityUserClaim navigation property to ApplicationUser causes migration to create new FK #58147
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: updates #58334
  • Como hackear o instagram de alguem 2024 #58361
  • Trusting the https certificate on Linux platforms fails with the error: "exporting the HTTPS developer certificate to a file." #58337
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #58318
  • Server-side Blazor Disable IUserIdProvider ？ #58112
  • AddAuthentication with AddOpenIdConnect, and webapp behind a proxy produce different callback URIs depending on client side rendering or server side rendering #57916

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dead code and clean up multisz/a #58373
    area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58372
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Unquarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #58368
    area-networking
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #58364
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • Fix missing bullet list items in InputDate documentation #58310
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Simplifying TFA Validation Logic in MapIdentityApi #57989
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Use dependabot for Nuget instead of NPM #58342
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a1e255a` to `71815bb` #58362
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58350
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix handling for inert route parameters in MVC endpoints for OpenAPI #58311
    area-mvc, feature-openapi
  • Use new Dictionary AlternateLookup to avoid allocation in DictionaryJumpTable #58305
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
